channel.title: 大数据 on 个人笔记
channel.description: Recent content in 大数据 on 个人笔记

item.title: 数据管道概览
item.description: Data pipelines are a fundamental component of managing and processing data efficiently within modern systems. These pipelines typically encompass 5 predominant phases: Collect, Ingest, Store, Compute, and Consume. \1. Collect: Data is acquired from data stores, data streams, and applications, sourced remotely from devices, applications, or business systems. \2. Ingest: During the ingestion process, data is loaded into systems and organized within event queues. \3. Store: Post ingestion, organized data is stored in data warehouses, data lakes, and data lakehouses, along with various systems like databases, ensuring post-ingestion storage.
